Difficulty Notes: Testing basic (positive) validity of tile placement
Question: How many different spots can the new domino be validly placed in the kingdom? (assume different, valid, orientations of the new domino count as the same placement)
Rationale: Blue is not compatible with any other existing tiles other than the castle which is wild. However, the castle is only diagonally open, every orthogonal spot is already occupied by a tile. Therefore, there are no valid placements for the new domino.
